title: Champion Skins Tab
body: What do you guys think about having the ability to see all the skins you own rather than having to click on each individual champion? This could be located in the champions list under your summoner profile. It would go along with champions owned, available, etc. It sounds simple but could be more convenient for players and not too difficult to do. Just a thought.

replies.body: You can use Elophant for this, but having an option in the client would be way more convenient. Especially when the Elophant client prevents login
Indeed, this would be a very good addition to the client. Hope Riot implements this.
I believe that this can be accomplished in the store. Go to skins and make the filter as "champion owned" and the sort by as "champions". Try and see if it works for you. :)
